aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: I am a dedicated Software Engineering student with a passion for backend engineering, security, and building reliable systems. My academic journey has equipped me with a strong foundation in software engineering principles, and I am keen to apply and deepen these skills in real-world scenarios.

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.text: During my time as I student I always wanted to apply my learned skills in practice and thus already gathered some work experience.

education.title: Education
education.text: I finished my high school education in Vienna and then went on to start my academic education in the field of computer science. A few years later I switched to medicine and enrolled at the Medical University of Vienna
